name: Ratatan X
description:
It's the game that keeps going!

Ratatan X (a remake of a game made in a day, made after the day that game was made on) offers an endless rush to hit the planet while balancing Ratatan against gravity. Don't let her down! If you lose a round, your score gets subtracted. If you do well though, she can start to shine!

Made with PICO-8

Made by Uneven Prankster, 2021
